fixes.name: Change MTM (in CAD)
fixes.dax_expression: 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MTM (in CAD) T] - 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MTM (In CAD) T-1]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau subtraction of two calculated fields to a DAX measure by mapping each field reference to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName] and using direct subtraction.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The referenced calculated fields depend on Tableau parameters; per rules any calculation that uses parameters (directly or via dependencies) must be a measure.
